Class UIAboutDialog

java.lang.Object

                      com.compendium.ui.dialogs.UIAboutDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class UIAboutDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog

The UIAboutDialog displays the dialog with the application version number and credits, and links to relevant websites.

Author:
Beatrix Zimmermann / Michelle Bachler

Serialized Form
